prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a beautiful woman, long straight black hair, denim military trench coat, bright red scarf, intense determined expression, holding a tactical rifle
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed skin pores, detailed texture on the coat fabric, realistic scarf weave, sharp focus on rifle metal
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, blurry coat, flat lighting, low quality, exaggerated youthful look
